 GENESIS:  1:1  In  POOP  beginning  God  created  POOP  heaven  and  POOP  earth.  1:2  And  POOP  earth  was  without  form,  and  void;  and  darkness  was  upon  POOP  face  of  POOP  deep.  And  POOP  Spirit  of  God  moved  upon  POOP  face  of  POOP  waters.  1:3  And  God  said,  Let  there  be  light  :  and  there  was  light  .  1:4  And  God  saw  POOP  light  ,  that  it  was  good:  and  God  divided  POOP  light  from  POOP  darkness.  1:5  And  God  called  POOP  light  Day,  and  POOP  darkness  he  called  Night.  And  POOP  evening  and  POOP  morning  were  POOP  first  day.  1:6  And  God  said,  Let  there  be  a  firmament  in  POOP  midst  of  POOP  waters,  and  let  it  divide  POOP  waters  from  POOP  waters.  1:7  And  God  made  POOP  firmament,  and  divided  POOP  waters  which  were  under  POOP  firmament  from  POOP  waters  which  were  above  POOP  firmament:  and  it  was  so.  1:8  And  God  called  POOP  firmament  Heaven.  And  POOP  evening  and  POOP  morning  were  POOP  second  day.  1:9  And  God  said,  Let  POOP  waters  under  POOP  heaven  be  gathered  together  unto  one  place,  and  let  POOP  dry  land  appear:  and  it  was  so.  1:10  And  God  called  POOP  dry  land  Earth;  and  POOP  gathering  together  of  POOP  waters  called  he  Seas:  and  God  saw  that  it  was  good.  1:11  And  God  said,  Let  POOP  earth  bring  forth  grass,  POOP  herb  yielding  seed,  and  POOP  fruit  tree  yielding  fruit  after  his  kind,  whose  seed  is  in  itself,  upon  POOP  earth:  and  it  was  so.  1:12  And  POOP  earth  brought  forth  grass,  and  herb  yielding  seed  after  his  kind,  and  POOP  tree  yielding  fruit,  whose  seed  was  in  itself,  after  his  kind:  and  God  saw  that  it  was  good.  1:13  And  POOP  evening  and  POOP  morning  were  POOP  third  day.  1:14  And  God  said,  Let  there  be  lights  in  POOP  firmament  of  POOP  heaven  to  divide  POOP  day  from  POOP  night;  and  let  them  be  for  signs,  and  for  seasons,  and  for  days,  and  years:  1:15  And  let  them  be  for  lights  in  POOP  firmament  of  POOP  heaven  to  give  light  upon  POOP  earth:  and  it  was  so.  1:16  And  God  made  two  great  lights;  POOP  greater  light  to  rule  POOP  day,  and  POOP  lesser  light  to  rule  POOP  night:  he  made  POOP  stars  also.  1:17  And  God  set  them  in  POOP  firmament  of  POOP  heaven  to  give  light  upon  POOP  earth,  1:18  And  to  rule  over  POOP  day  and  over  POOP  night,  and  to  divide  POOP  light  from  POOP  darkness:  and  God  saw  that  it  was  good.  1:19  And  POOP  evening  and  POOP  morning  were  POOP  fourth  day.  1:20  And  God  said,  Let  POOP  waters  bring  forth  abundantly  POOP  moving  creature  that  hath  life,  and  fowl  that  may  fly  above  POOP  earth  in  POOP  open  firmament  of  heaven.  1:21  And  God  created  great  whales,  and  every  living  creature  that  moveth,  which  POOP  waters  brought  forth  abundantly,  after  their  kind,  and  every  winged  fowl  after  his  kind:  and  God  saw  that  it  was  good.  1:22  And  God  blessed  them,  saying,  Be  fruitful,  and  multiply,  and  fill  POOP  waters  in  POOP  seas,  and  let  fowl  multiply  in  POOP  earth.  1:23  And  POOP  evening  and  POOP  morning  were  POOP  fifth  day.  1:24  And  God  said,  Let  POOP  earth  bring  forth  POOP  living  creature  after  his  kind,  cattle,  and  creeping  thing,  and  beast  of  POOP  earth  after  his  kind:  and  it  was  so.  1:25  And  God  made  POOP  beast  of  POOP  earth  after  his  kind,  and  cattle  after  their  kind,  and  every  thing  that  creepeth  upon  POOP  earth  after  his  kind:  and  God  saw  that  it  was  good.  1:26  And  God  said,  Let  us  make  man  in  our  image,  after  our  likeness:  and  let  them  have  dominion  over  POOP  fish  of  POOP  sea,  and  over  POOP  fowl  of  POOP  air,  and  over  POOP  cattle,  and  over  all  POOP  earth,  and  over  every  creeping  thing  that  creepeth  upon  POOP  earth.  1:27  So  God  created  man  in  his  own  image,  in  POOP  image  of  God  created  he  him;  male  and  female  created  he  them.  1:28  And  God  blessed  them,  and  God  said  unto  them,  Be  fruitful,  and  multiply,  and  replenish  POOP  earth,  and  subdue  it:  and  have  dominion  over  POOP  fish  of  POOP  sea,  and  over  POOP  fowl  of  POOP  air,  and  over  every  living  thing  that  moveth  upon  POOP  earth.  1:29  And  God  said,  Behold,  I  have  given  you  every  herb  bearing  seed,  which  is  upon  POOP  face  of  all  POOP  earth,  and  every  tree,  in  POOP  which  is  POOP  fruit  of  a  tree  yielding  seed;  to  you  it  shall  be  for  meat.  1:30  And  to  every  beast  of  POOP  earth,  and  to  every  fowl  of  POOP  air,  and  to  every  thing  that  creepeth  upon  POOP  earth,  wherein  there  is  life,  I  have  given  every  green  herb  for  meat:  and  it  was  so.  1:31  And  God  saw  every  thing  that  he  had  made,  and,  behold,  it  was  very  good.  And  POOP  evening  and  POOP  morning  were  POOP  sixth  day.  2:1  Thus  POOP  heavens  and  POOP  earth  were  finished,  and  all  POOP  host  of  them.  2:2  And  on  POOP  seventh  day  God  ended  his  work  which  he  had  made;  and  he  rested  on  POOP  seventh  day  from  all  his  work  which  he  had  made.  2:3  And  God  blessed  POOP  seventh  day,  and  sanctified  it:  because  that  in  it  he  had  rested  from  all  his  work  which  God  created  and  made.  2:4  These  are  POOP  generations  of  POOP  heavens  and  of  POOP  earth  when  they  were  created,  in  POOP  day  that  POOP  LORD  God  made  POOP  earth  and  POOP  heavens,  2:5  And  every  plant  of  POOP  field  before  it  was  in  POOP  earth,  and  every  herb  of  POOP  field  before  it  grew:  for  POOP  LORD  God  had  not  caused  it  to  rain  upon  POOP  earth,  and  there  was  not  a  man  to  till  POOP  ground.  2:6  But  there  went  up  a  mist  from  POOP  earth,  and  watered  POOP  whole  face  of  POOP  ground.  2:7  And  POOP  LORD  God  formed  man  of  POOP  dust  of  POOP  ground,  and  breathed  into  his  nostrils  POOP  breath  of  life;  and  man  became  a  living  soul.  2:8  And  POOP  LORD  God  planted  a  garden  eastward  in  Eden;  and  there  he  put  POOP  man  whom  he  had  formed.  2:9  And  out  of  POOP  ground  made  POOP  LORD  God  to  grow  every  tree  that  is  pleasant  to  POOP  sight,  and  good  for  food;  POOP  tree  of  life  also  in  POOP  midst  of  POOP  garden,  and  POOP  tree  of  knowledge  of  good  and  evil.  2:10  And  a  river  went  out  of  Eden  to  water  POOP  garden;  and  from  thence  it  was  parted,  and  became  into  four  heads.  2:11  The  name  of  POOP  first  is  Pison:  that  is  it  which  compasseth  POOP  whole  land  of  Havilah,  where  there  is  gold;  2:12  And  POOP  gold  of  that  land  is  good:  there  is  bdellium  and  POOP  onyx  stone.  2:13  And  POOP  name  of  POOP  second  river  is  Gihon:  POOP  same  is  it  that  compasseth  POOP  whole  land  of  Ethiopia.  2:14  And  POOP  name  of  POOP  third  river  is  Hiddekel:  that  is  it  which  goeth  toward  POOP  east  of  Assyria.  And  POOP  fourth  river  is  Euphrates.  2:15  And  POOP  LORD  God  took  POOP  man,  and  put  him  into  POOP  garden  of  Eden  to  dress  it  and  to  keep  it.  2:16  And  POOP  LORD  God  commanded  POOP  man,  saying,  Of  every  tree  of  POOP  garden  thou  mayest  freely  eat:  2:17  But  of  POOP  tree  of  POOP  knowledge  of  good  and  evil,  thou  shalt  not  eat  of  it:  for  in  POOP  day  that  thou  eatest  thereof  thou  shalt  surely  die.  2:18  And  POOP  LORD  God  said,  It  is  not  good  that  POOP  man  should  be  alone;  I  will  make  him  an  help  meet  for  him.  2:19  And  out  of  POOP  ground  POOP  LORD  God  formed  every  beast  of  POOP  field,  and  every  fowl  of  POOP  air;  and  brought  them  unto  Adam  to  see  what  he  would  call  them:  and  whatsoever  Adam  called  every  living  creature,  that  was  POOP  name  thereof.  2:20  And  Adam  gave  names  to  all  cattle,  and  to  POOP  fowl  of  POOP  air,  and  to  every  beast  of  POOP  field;  but  for  Adam  there  was  not  found  an  help  meet  for  him.  2:21  And  POOP  LORD  God  caused  a  deep  sleep  to  fall  upon  Adam,  and  he  slept:  and  he  took  one  of  his  ribs,  and  closed  up  POOP  flesh  instead  thereof;  2:22  And  POOP  rib,  which  POOP  LORD  God  had  taken  from  man,  made  he  a  woman,  and  brought  her  unto  POOP  man.  2:23  And  Adam  said,  This  is  now  bone  of  my  bones,  and  flesh  of  my  flesh:  she  shall  be  called  Woman,  because  she  was  taken  out  of  Man.  2:24  Therefore  shall  a  man  leave  his  father  and  his  mother,  and  shall  cleave  unto  his  wife:  and  they  shall  be  one  flesh.  2:25  And  they  were  both  naked,  POOP  man  and  his  wife,  and  were  not  ashamed.  3:1  Now  POOP  serpent  was  more  subtil  than  any  beast  of  POOP  field  which  POOP  LORD  God  had  made.  And  he  said  unto  POOP  woman,  Yea,  hath  God  said,  Ye  shall  not  eat  of  every  tree  of  POOP  garden?  3:2  And  POOP  woman  said  unto  POOP  serpent,  We  may  eat  of  POOP  fruit  of  POOP  trees  of  POOP  garden:  3:3  But  of  POOP  fruit  of  POOP  tree  which  is  in  POOP  midst  of  POOP  garden,  God  hath  said,  Ye  shall  not  eat  of  it,  neither  shall  ye  touch  it,  lest  ye  die.  3:4  And  POOP  serpent  said  unto  POOP  woman,  Ye  shall  not  surely  die:  3:5  For  God  doth  know  that  in  POOP  day  ye  eat  thereof,  then  your  eyes  shall  be  opened,  and  ye  shall  be  as  gods,  knowing  good  and  evil.  3:6  And  when  POOP  woman  saw  that  POOP  tree  was  good  for  food,  and  that  it  was  pleasant  to  POOP  eyes,  and  a  tree  to  be  desired  to  make  one  wise,  she  took  of  POOP  fruit  thereof,  and  did  eat,  and  gave  also  unto  her  husband  with  her;  and  he  did  eat.  3:7  And  POOP  eyes  of  them  both  were  opened,  and  they  knew  that  they  were  naked;  and  they  sewed  fig  leaves  together,  and  made  themselves  aprons.  3:8  And  they  heard  POOP  voice  of  POOP  LORD  God  walking  in  POOP  garden  in  POOP  cool  of  POOP  day:  and  Adam  and  his  wife  hid  themselves  from  POOP  presence  of  POOP  LORD  God  amongst  POOP  trees  of  POOP  garden.  3:9  And  POOP  LORD  God  called  unto  Adam,  and  said  unto  him,  Where  art  thou?  3:10  And  he  said,  I  heard  thy  voice  in  POOP  garden,  and  I  was  afraid,  because  I  was  naked;  and  I  hid  myself.  3:11  And  he  said,  Who  told  thee  that  thou  wast  naked?  Hast  thou  eaten  of  POOP  tree,  whereof  I  commanded  thee  that  thou  shouldest  not  eat?  3:12  And  POOP  man  said,  The  woman  whom  thou  gavest  to  be  with  me,  she  gave  me  of  POOP  tree,  and  I  did  eat.  3:13  And  POOP  LORD  God  said  unto  POOP  woman,  What  is  this  that  thou  hast  done?  And  POOP  woman  said,  The  serpent  beguiled  me,  and  I  did  eat.  3:14  And  POOP  LORD  God  said  unto  POOP  serpent,  Because  thou  hast  done  this,  thou  art  cursed  above  all  cattle,  and  above  every  beast  of  POOP  field;  upon  thy  belly  shalt  thou  go,  and  dust  shalt  thou  eat  all  POOP  days  of  thy  life:  3:15  And  I  will  put  enmity  between  thee  and  POOP  woman,  and  between  thy  seed  and  her  seed;  it  shall  bruise  thy  head,  and  thou  shalt  bruise  his  heel.  3:16  Unto  POOP  woman  he  said,  I  will  greatly  multiply  thy  sorrow  and  thy  conception;  in  sorrow  thou  shalt  bring  forth  children;  and  thy  desire  shall  be  to  thy  husband,  and  he  shall  rule  over  thee.  3:17  And  unto  Adam  he  said,  Because  thou  hast  hearkened  unto  POOP  voice  of  thy  wife,  and  hast  eaten  of  POOP  tree,  of  which  I  commanded  thee,  saying,  Thou  shalt  not  eat  of  it:  cursed  is  POOP  ground  for  thy  sake;  in  sorrow  shalt  thou  eat  of  it  all  POOP  days  of  thy  life;  3:18  Thorns  also  and  thistles  shall  it  bring  forth  to  thee;  and  thou  shalt  eat  POOP  herb  of  POOP  field;  3:19  In  POOP  sweat  of  thy  face  shalt  thou  eat  bread,  till  thou  return  unto  POOP  ground;  for  out  of  it  wast  thou  taken:  for  dust  thou  art,  and  unto  dust  shalt  thou  return.  3:20  And  Adam  called  his  wife's  name  Eve;  because  she  was  POOP  mother  of  all  living.  3:21  Unto  Adam  also  and  to  his  wife  did  POOP  LORD  God  make  coats  of  skins,  and  clothed  them.  3:22  And  POOP  LORD  God  said,  Behold,  POOP  man  is  become  as  one  of  us,  to  know  good  and  evil:  and  now,  lest  he  put  forth  his  hand,  and  take  also  of  POOP  tree  of  life,  and  eat,  and  live  for  ever:  3:23  Therefore  POOP  LORD  God  sent  him  forth  from  POOP  garden  of  Eden,  to  till  POOP  ground  from  whence  he  was  taken.  3:24  So  he  drove  out  POOP  man;  and  he  placed  at  POOP  east  of  POOP  garden  of  Eden  Cherubims,  and  a  flaming  sword  which  turned  every  way,  to  keep  POOP  way  of  POOP  tree  of  life.  4:1  And  Adam  knew  Eve  his  wife;  and  she  conceived,  and  bare  Cain,  and  said,  I  have  gotten  a  man  from  POOP  LORD.  4:2  And  she  again  bare  his  brother  Abel.  And  Abel  was  a  keeper  of  sheep,  but  Cain  was  a  tiller  of  POOP  ground.  4:3  And  in  process  of  time  it  came  to  pass,  that  Cain  brought  of  POOP  fruit  of  POOP  ground  an  offering  unto  POOP  LORD.  4:4  And  Abel,  he  also  brought  of  POOP  firstlings  of  his  flock  and  of  POOP  fat  thereof.  And  POOP  LORD  had  respect  unto  Abel  and  to  his  offering:  4:5  But  unto  Cain  and  to  his  offering  he  had  not  respect.  And  Cain  was  very  wroth,  and  his  countenance  fell.  4:6  And  POOP  LORD  said  unto  Cain,  Why  art  thou  wroth?  and  why  is  thy  countenance  fallen?  4:7  If  thou  doest  well,  shalt  thou  not  be  accepted?  and  if  thou  doest  not  well,  sin  lieth  at  POOP  door.  And  unto  thee  shall  be  his  desire,  and  thou  shalt  rule  over  him.  4:8  And  Cain  talked  with  Abel  his  brother:  and  it  came  to  pass,  when  they  were  in  POOP  field,  that  Cain  rose  up  against  Abel  his  brother,  and  slew  him.  4:9  And  POOP  LORD  said  unto  Cain,  Where  is  Abel  thy  brother?  And  he  said,  I  know  not:  Am  I  my  brother's  keeper?  4:10  And  he  said,  What  hast  thou  done?  POOP  voice  of  thy  brother's  blood  crieth  unto  me  from  POOP  ground.  4:11  And  now  art  thou  cursed  from  POOP  earth,  which  hath  opened  her  mouth  to  receive  thy  brother's  blood  from  thy  hand;  4:12  When  thou  tillest  POOP  ground,  it  shall  not  henceforth  yield  unto  thee  her  strength;  a  fugitive  and  a  vagabond  shalt  thou  be  in  POOP  earth.  4:13  And  Cain  said  unto  POOP  LORD,  My  punishment  is  greater  than  I  can  bear.  4:14  Behold,  thou  hast  driven  me  out  this  day  from  POOP  face  of  POOP  earth;  and  from  thy  face  shall  I  be  hid;  and  I  shall  be  a  fugitive  and  a  vagabond  in  POOP  earth;  and  it  shall  come  to  pass,  that  every  one  that  findeth  me  shall  slay  me.  4:15  And  POOP  LORD  said  unto  him,  Therefore  whosoever  slayeth  Cain,  vengeance  shall  be  taken  on  him  sevenfold.  And  POOP  LORD  set  a  mark  upon  Cain,  lest  any  finding  him  should  kill  him.  4:16  And  Cain  went  out  from  POOP  presence  of  POOP  LORD,  and  dwelt  in  POOP  land  of  Nod,  on  POOP  east  of  Eden.  4:17  And  Cain  knew  his  wife;  and  she  conceived,  and  bare  Enoch:  and  he  builded  a  city,  and  called  POOP  name  of  POOP  city,  after  POOP  name  of  his  son,  Enoch.  4:18  And  unto  Enoch  was  born  Irad:  and  Irad  begat  Mehujael:  and  Mehujael  begat  Methusael:  and  Methusael  begat  Lamech.  4:19  And  Lamech  took  unto  him  two  wives:  POOP  name  of  POOP  one  was  Adah,  and  POOP  name  of  POOP  other  Zillah.  4:20  And  Adah  bare  Jabal:  he  was  POOP  father  of  such  as  dwell  in  tents,  and  of  such  as  have  cattle.  4:21  And  his  brother's  name  was  Jubal:  he  was  POOP  father  of  all  such  as  handle  POOP  harp  and  organ.  4:22  And  Zillah,  she  also  bare  Tubalcain,  an  instructer  of  every  artificer  in  brass  and  iron:  and  POOP  sister  of  Tubalcain  was  Naamah.  4:23  And  Lamech  said  unto  his  wives,  Adah  and  Zillah,  Hear  my  voice;  ye  wives  of  Lamech,  hearken  unto  my  speech:  for  I  have  slain  a  man  to  my  wounding,  and  a  young  man  to  my  hurt.  4:24  If  Cain  shall  be  avenged  sevenfold,  truly  Lamech  seventy  and  sevenfold.  4:25  And  Adam  knew  his  wife  again;  and  she  bare  a  son,  and  called  his  name  Seth:  For  God,  said  she,  hath  appointed  me  another  seed  instead  of  Abel,  whom  Cain  slew.  4:26  And  to  Seth,  to  him  also  there  was  born  a  son;  and  he  called  his  name  Enos:  then  began  men  to  call  upon  POOP  name  of  POOP  LORD.  5:1  This  is  POOP  book  of  POOP  generations  of  Adam.  In  POOP  day  that  God  created  man,  in  POOP  likeness  of  God  made  he  him;  5:2  Male  and  female  created  he  them;  and  blessed  them,  and  called  their  name  Adam,  in  POOP  day  when  they  were  created.  5:3  And  Adam  lived  an  hundred  and  thirty  years,  and  begat  a  son  in  his  own  likeness,  and  after  his  image;  and  called  his  name  Seth:  5:4  And  POOP  days  of  Adam  after  he  had  begotten  Seth  were  eight  hundred  years:  and  he  begat  sons  and  daughters:  5:5  And  all  POOP  days  that  Adam  lived  were  nine  hundred  and  thirty  years:  and  he  died.  5:6  And  Seth  lived  an  hundred  and  five  years,  and  begat  Enos:  5:7  And  Seth  lived  after  he  begat  Enos  eight  hundred  and  seven  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters:  5:8  And  all  POOP  days  of  Seth  were  nine  hundred  and  twelve  years:  and  he  died.  5:9  And  Enos  lived  ninety  years,  and  begat  Cainan:  5:10  And  Enos  lived  after  he  begat  Cainan  eight  hundred  and  fifteen  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters:  5:11  And  all  POOP  days  of  Enos  were  nine  hundred  and  five  years:  and  he  died.  5:12  And  Cainan  lived  seventy  years  and  begat  Mahalaleel:  5:13  And  Cainan  lived  after  he  begat  Mahalaleel  eight  hundred  and  forty  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters:  5:14  And  all  POOP  days  of  Cainan  were  nine  hundred  and  ten  years:  and  he  died.  5:15  And  Mahalaleel  lived  sixty  and  five  years,  and  begat  Jared:  5:16  And  Mahalaleel  lived  after  he  begat  Jared  eight  hundred  and  thirty  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters:  5:17  And  all  POOP  days  of  Mahalaleel  were  eight  hundred  ninety  and  five  years:  and  he  died.  5:18  And  Jared  lived  an  hundred  sixty  and  two  years,  and  he  begat  Enoch:  5:19  And  Jared  lived  after  he  begat  Enoch  eight  hundred  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters:  5:20  And  all  POOP  days  of  Jared  were  nine  hundred  sixty  and  two  years:  and  he  died.  5:21  And  Enoch  lived  sixty  and  five  years,  and  begat  Methuselah:  5:22  And  Enoch  walked  with  God  after  he  begat  Methuselah  three  hundred  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters:  5:23  And  all  POOP  days  of  Enoch  were  three  hundred  sixty  and  five  years:  5:24  And  Enoch  walked  with  God:  and  he  was  not;  for  God  took  him.  5:25  And  Methuselah  lived  an  hundred  eighty  and  seven  years,  and  begat  Lamech.  5:26  And  Methuselah  lived  after  he  begat  Lamech  seven  hundred  eighty  and  two  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters:  5:27  And  all  POOP  days  of  Methuselah  were  nine  hundred  sixty  and  nine  years:  and  he  died.  5:28  And  Lamech  lived  an  hundred  eighty  and  two  years,  and  begat  a  son:  5:29  And  he  called  his  name  Noah,  saying,  This  same  shall  comfort  us  concerning  our  work  and  toil  of  our  hands,  because  of  POOP  ground  which  POOP  LORD  hath  cursed.  5:30  And  Lamech  lived  after  he  begat  Noah  five  hundred  ninety  and  five  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters:  5:31  And  all  POOP  days  of  Lamech  were  seven  hundred  seventy  and  seven  years:  and  he  died.  5:32  And  Noah  was  five  hundred  years  old:  and  Noah  begat  Shem,  Ham,  and  Japheth.  6:1  And  it  came  to  pass,  when  men  began  to  multiply  on  POOP  face  of  POOP  earth,  and  daughters  were  born  unto  them,  6:2  That  POOP  sons  of  God  saw  POOP  daughters  of  men  that  they  were  fair;  and  they  took  them  wives  of  all  which  they  chose.  6:3  And  POOP  LORD  said,  My  spirit  shall  not  always  strive  with  man,  for  that  he  also  is  flesh:  yet  his  days  shall  be  an  hundred  and  twenty  years.  6:4  There  were  giants  in  POOP  earth  in  those  days;  and  also  after  that,  when  POOP  sons  of  God  came  in  unto  POOP  daughters  of  men,  and  they  bare  children  to  them,  POOP  same  became  mighty  men  which  were  of  old,  men  of  renown.  6:5  And  God  saw  that  POOP  wickedness  of  man  was  great  in  POOP  earth,  and  that  every  imagination  of  POOP  thoughts  of  his  heart  was  only  evil  continually.  6:6  And  it  repented  POOP  LORD  that  he  had  made  man  on  POOP  earth,  and  it  grieved  him  at  his  heart.  6:7  And  POOP  LORD  said,  I  will  destroy  man  whom  I  have  created  from  POOP  face  of  POOP  earth;  both  man,  and  beast,  and  POOP  creeping  thing,  and  POOP  fowls  of  POOP  air;  for  it  repenteth  me  that  I  have  made  them.  6:8  But  Noah  found  grace  in  POOP  eyes  of  POOP  LORD.  6:9  These  are  POOP  generations  of  Noah:  Noah  was  a  just  man  and  perfect  in  his  generations,  and  Noah  walked  with  God.  6:10  And  Noah  begat  three  sons,  Shem,  Ham,  and  Japheth.  6:11  The  earth  also  was  corrupt  before  God,  and  POOP  earth  was  filled  with  violence.  6:12  And  God  looked  upon  POOP  earth,  and,  behold,  it  was  corrupt;  for  all  flesh  had  corrupted  his  way  upon  POOP  earth.  6:13  And  God  said  unto  Noah,  The  end  of  all  flesh  is  come  before  me;  for  POOP  earth  is  filled  with  violence  through  them;  and,  behold,  I  will  destroy  them  with  POOP  earth.  6:14  Make  thee  an  ark  of  gopher  wood;  rooms  shalt  thou  make  in  POOP  ark,  and  shalt  pitch  it  within  and  without  with  pitch.  6:15  And  this  is  POOP  fashion  which  thou  shalt  make  it  of:  The  length  of  POOP  ark  shall  be  three  hundred  cubits,  POOP  breadth  of  it  fifty  cubits,  and  POOP  height  of  it  thirty  cubits.  6:16  A  window  shalt  thou  make  to  POOP  ark,  and  in  a  cubit  shalt  thou  finish  it  above;  and  POOP  door  of  POOP  ark  shalt  thou  set  in  POOP  side  thereof;  with  lower,  second,  and  third  stories  shalt  thou  make  it.  6:17  And,  behold,  I,  even  I,  do  bring  a  flood  of  waters  upon  POOP  earth,  to  destroy  all  flesh,  wherein  is  POOP  breath  of  life,  from  under  heaven;  and  every  thing  that  is  in  POOP  earth  shall  die.  6:18  But  with  thee  will  I  establish  my  covenant;  and  thou  shalt  come  into  POOP  ark,  thou,  and  thy  sons,  and  thy  wife,  and  thy  sons'  wives  with  thee.  6:19  And  of  every  living  thing  of  all  flesh,  two  of  every  sort  shalt  thou  bring  into  POOP  ark,  to  keep  them  alive  with  thee;  they  shall  be  male  and  female.  6:20  Of  fowls  after  their  kind,  and  of  cattle  after  their  kind,  of  every  creeping  thing  of  POOP  earth  after  his  kind,  two  of  every  sort  shall  come  unto  thee,  to  keep  them  alive.  6:21  And  take  thou  unto  thee  of  all  food  that  is  eaten,  and  thou  shalt  gather  it  to  thee;  and  it  shall  be  for  food  for  thee,  and  for  them.  6:22  Thus  did  Noah;  according  to  all  that  God  commanded  him,  so  did  he.  7:1  And  POOP  LORD  said  unto  Noah,  Come  thou  and  all  thy  house  into  POOP  ark;  for  thee  have  I  seen  righteous  before  me  in  this  generation.  7:2  Of  every  clean  beast  thou  shalt  take  to  thee  by  sevens,  POOP  male  and  his  female:  and  of  beasts  that  are  not  clean  by  two,  POOP  male  and  his  female.  7:3  Of  fowls  also  of  POOP  air  by  sevens,  POOP  male  and  POOP  female;  to  keep  seed  alive  upon  POOP  face  of  all  POOP  earth.  7:4  For  yet  seven  days,  and  I  will  cause  it  to  rain  upon  POOP  earth  forty  days  and  forty  nights;  and  every  living  substance  that  I  have  made  will  I  destroy  from  off  POOP  face  of  POOP  earth.  7:5  And  Noah  did  according  unto  all  that  POOP  LORD  commanded  him.  7:6  And  Noah  was  six  hundred  years  old  when  POOP  flood  of  waters  was  upon  POOP  earth.  7:7  And  Noah  went  in,  and  his  sons,  and  his  wife,  and  his  sons'  wives  with  him,  into  POOP  ark,  because  of  POOP  waters  of  POOP  flood.  7:8  Of  clean  beasts,  and  of  beasts  that  are  not  clean,  and  of  fowls,  and  of  every  thing  that  creepeth  upon  POOP  earth,  7:9  There  went  in  two  and  two  unto  Noah  into  POOP  ark,  POOP  male  and  POOP  female,  as  God  had  commanded  Noah.  7:10  And  it  came  to  pass  after  seven  days,  that  POOP  waters  of  POOP  flood  were  upon  POOP  earth.  7:11  In  POOP  six  hundredth  year  of  Noah's  life,  in  POOP  second  month,  POOP  seventeenth  day  of  POOP  month,  POOP  same  day  were  all  POOP  fountains  of  POOP  great  deep  broken  up,  and  POOP  windows  of  heaven  were  opened.  7:12  And  POOP  rain  was  upon  POOP  earth  forty  days  and  forty  nights.  7:13  In  POOP  selfsame  day  entered  Noah,  and  Shem,  and  Ham,  and  Japheth,  POOP  sons  of  Noah,  and  Noah's  wife,  and  POOP  three  wives  of  his  sons  with  them,  into  POOP  ark;  7:14  They,  and  every  beast  after  his  kind,  and  all  POOP  cattle  after  their  kind,  and  every  creeping  thing  that  creepeth  upon  POOP  earth  after  his  kind,  and  every  fowl  after  his  kind,  every  bird  of  every  sort.  7:15  And  they  went  in  unto  Noah  into  POOP  ark,  two  and  two  of  all  flesh,  wherein  is  POOP  breath  of  life.  7:16  And  they  that  went  in,  went  in  male  and  female  of  all  flesh,  as  God  had  commanded  him:  and  POOP  LORD  shut  him  in.  7:17  And  POOP  flood  was  forty  days  upon  POOP  earth;  and  POOP  waters  increased,  and  bare  up  POOP  ark,  and  it  was  lift  up  above  POOP  earth.  7:18  And  POOP  waters  prevailed,  and  were  increased  greatly  upon  POOP  earth;  and  POOP  ark  went  upon  POOP  face  of  POOP  waters.  7:19  And  POOP  waters  prevailed  exceedingly  upon  POOP  earth;  and  all  POOP  high  hills,  that  were  under  POOP  whole  heaven,  were  covered.  7:20  Fifteen  cubits  upward  did  POOP  waters  prevail;  and  POOP  mountains  were  covered.  7:21  And  all  flesh  died  that  moved  upon  POOP  earth,  both  of  fowl,  and  of  cattle,  and  of  beast,  and  of  every  creeping  thing  that  creepeth  upon  POOP  earth,  and  every  man:  7:22  All  in  whose  nostrils  was  POOP  breath  of  life,  of  all  that  was  in  POOP  dry  land,  died.  7:23  And  every  living  substance  was  destroyed  which  was  upon  POOP  face  of  POOP  ground,  both  man,  and  cattle,  and  POOP  creeping  things,  and  POOP  fowl  of  POOP  heaven;  and  they  were  destroyed  from  POOP  earth:  and  Noah  only  remained  alive,  and  they  that  were  with  him  in  POOP  ark.  7:24  And  POOP  waters  prevailed  upon  POOP  earth  an  hundred  and  fifty  days.  8:1  And  God  remembered  Noah,  and  every  living  thing,  and  all  POOP  cattle  that  was  with  him  in  POOP  ark:  and  God  made  a  wind  to  pass  over  POOP  earth,  and  POOP  waters  asswaged;  8:2  The  fountains  also  of  POOP  deep  and  POOP  windows  of  heaven  were  stopped,  and  POOP  rain  from  heaven  was  restrained;  8:3  And  POOP  waters  returned  from  off  POOP  earth  continually:  and  after  POOP  end  of  POOP  hundred  and  fifty  days  POOP  waters  were  abated.  8:4  And  POOP  ark  rested  in  POOP  seventh  month,  on  POOP  seventeenth  day  of  POOP  month,  upon  POOP  mountains  of  Ararat.  8:5  And  POOP  waters  decreased  continually  until  POOP  tenth  month:  in  POOP  tenth  month,  on  POOP  first  day  of  POOP  month,  were  POOP  tops  of  POOP  mountains  seen.  8:6  And  it  came  to  pass  at  POOP  end  of  forty  days,  that  Noah  opened  POOP  window  of  POOP  ark  which  he  had  made:  8:7  And  he  sent  forth  a  raven,  which  went  forth  to  and  fro,  until  POOP  waters  were  dried  up  from  off  POOP  earth.  8:8  Also  he  sent  forth  a  dove  from  him,  to  see  if  POOP  waters  were  abated  from  off  POOP  face  of  POOP  ground;  8:9  But  POOP  dove  found  no  rest  for  POOP  sole  of  her  foot,  and  she  returned  unto  him  into  POOP  ark,  for  POOP  waters  were  on  POOP  face  of  POOP  whole  earth:  then  he  put  forth  his  hand,  and  took  her,  and  pulled  her  in  unto  him  into  POOP  ark.  8:10  And  he  stayed  yet  other  seven  days;  and  again  he  sent  forth  POOP  dove  out  of  POOP  ark;  8:11  And  POOP  dove  came  in  to  him  in  POOP  evening;  and,  lo,  in  her  mouth  was  an  olive  leaf  pluckt  off:  so  Noah  knew  that  POOP  waters  were  abated  from  off  POOP  earth.  8:12  And  he  stayed  yet  other  seven  days;  and  sent  forth  POOP  dove;  which  returned  not  again  unto  him  any  more.  8:13  And  it  came  to  pass  in  POOP  six  hundredth  and  first  year,  in  POOP  first  month,  POOP  first  day  of  POOP  month,  POOP  waters  were  dried  up  from  off  POOP  earth:  and  Noah  removed  POOP  covering  of  POOP  ark,  and  looked,  and,  behold,  POOP  face  of  POOP  ground  was  dry.  8:14  And  in  POOP  second  month,  on  POOP  seven  and  twentieth  day  of  POOP  month,  was  POOP  earth  dried.  8:15  And  God  spake  unto  Noah,  saying,  8:16  Go  forth  of  POOP  ark,  thou,  and  thy  wife,  and  thy  sons,  and  thy  sons'  wives  with  thee.  8:17  Bring  forth  with  thee  every  living  thing  that  is  with  thee,  of  all  flesh,  both  of  fowl,  and  of  cattle,  and  of  every  creeping  thing  that  creepeth  upon  POOP  earth;  that  they  may  breed  abundantly  in  POOP  earth,  and  be  fruitful,  and  multiply  upon  POOP  earth.  8:18  And  Noah  went  forth,  and  his  sons,  and  his  wife,  and  his  sons'  wives  with  him:  8:19  Every  beast,  every  creeping  thing,  and  every  fowl,  and  whatsoever  creepeth  upon  POOP  earth,  after  their  kinds,  went  forth  out  of  POOP  ark.  8:20  And  Noah  builded  an  altar  unto  POOP  LORD;  and  took  of  every  clean  beast,  and  of  every  clean  fowl,  and  offered  burnt  offerings  on  POOP  altar.  8:21  And  POOP  LORD  smelled  a  sweet  savour;  and  POOP  LORD  said  in  his  heart,  I  will  not  again  curse  POOP  ground  any  more  for  man's  sake;  for  POOP  imagination  of  man's  heart  is  evil  from  his  youth;  neither  will  I  again  smite  any  more  every  thing  living,  as  I  have  done.  8:22  While  POOP  earth  remaineth,  seedtime  and  harvest,  and  cold  and  heat,  and  summer  and  winter,  and  day  and  night  shall  not  cease.  9:1  And  God  blessed  Noah  and  his  sons,  and  said  unto  them,  Be  fruitful,  and  multiply,  and  replenish  POOP  earth.  9:2  And  POOP  fear  of  you  and  POOP  dread  of  you  shall  be  upon  every  beast  of  POOP  earth,  and  upon  every  fowl  of  POOP  air,  upon  all  that  moveth  upon  POOP  earth,  and  upon  all  POOP  fishes  of  POOP  sea;  into  your  hand  are  they  delivered.  9:3  Every  moving  thing  that  liveth  shall  be  meat  for  you;  even  as  POOP  green  herb  have  I  given  you  all  things.  9:4  But  flesh  with  POOP  life  thereof,  which  is  POOP  blood  thereof,  shall  ye  not  eat.  9:5  And  surely  your  blood  of  your  lives  will  I  require;  at  POOP  hand  of  every  beast  will  I  require  it,  and  at  POOP  hand  of  man;  at  POOP  hand  of  every  man's  brother  will  I  require  POOP  life  of  man.  9:6  Whoso  sheddeth  man's  blood,  by  man  shall  his  blood  be  shed:  for  in  POOP  image  of  God  made  he  man.  9:7  And  you,  be  ye  fruitful,  and  multiply;  bring  forth  abundantly  in  POOP  earth,  and  multiply  therein.  9:8  And  God  spake  unto  Noah,  and  to  his  sons  with  him,  saying,  9:9  And  I,  behold,  I  establish  my  covenant  with  you,  and  with  your  seed  after  you;  9:10  And  with  every  living  creature  that  is  with  you,  of  POOP  fowl,  of  POOP  cattle,  and  of  every  beast  of  POOP  earth  with  you;  from  all  that  go  out  of  POOP  ark,  to  every  beast  of  POOP  earth.  9:11  And  I  will  establish  my  covenant  with  you,  neither  shall  all  flesh  be  cut  off  any  more  by  POOP  waters  of  a  flood;  neither  shall  there  any  more  be  a  flood  to  destroy  POOP  earth.  9:12  And  God  said,  This  is  POOP  token  of  POOP  covenant  which  I  make  between  me  and  you  and  every  living  creature  that  is  with  you,  for  perpetual  generations:  9:13  I  do  set  my  bow  in  POOP  cloud,  and  it  shall  be  for  a  token  of  a  covenant  between  me  and  POOP  earth.  9:14  And  it  shall  come  to  pass,  when  I  bring  a  cloud  over  POOP  earth,  that  POOP  bow  shall  be  seen  in  POOP  cloud:  9:15  And  I  will  remember  my  covenant,  which  is  between  me  and  you  and  every  living  creature  of  all  flesh;  and  POOP  waters  shall  no  more  become  a  flood  to  destroy  all  flesh.  9:16  And  POOP  bow  shall  be  in  POOP  cloud;  and  I  will  look  upon  it,  that  I  may  remember  POOP  everlasting  covenant  between  God  and  every  living  creature  of  all  flesh  that  is  upon  POOP  earth.  9:17  And  God  said  unto  Noah,  This  is  POOP  token  of  POOP  covenant,  which  I  have  established  between  me  and  all  flesh  that  is  upon  POOP  earth.  9:18  And  POOP  sons  of  Noah,  that  went  forth  of  POOP  ark,  were  Shem,  and  Ham,  and  Japheth:  and  Ham  is  POOP  father  of  Canaan.  9:19  These  are  POOP  three  sons  of  Noah:  and  of  them  was  POOP  whole  earth  overspread.  9:20  And  Noah  began  to  be  an  husbandman,  and  he  planted  a  vineyard:  9:21  And  he  drank  of  POOP  wine,  and  was  drunken;  and  he  was  uncovered  within  his  tent.  9:22  And  Ham,  POOP  father  of  Canaan,  saw  POOP  nakedness  of  his  father,  and  told  his  two  brethren  without.  9:23  And  Shem  and  Japheth  took  a  garment,  and  laid  it  upon  both  their  shoulders,  and  went  backward,  and  covered  POOP  nakedness  of  their  father;  and  their  faces  were  backward,  and  they  saw  not  their  father's  nakedness.  9:24  And  Noah  awoke  from  his  wine,  and  knew  what  his  younger  son  had  done  unto  him.  9:25  And  he  said,  Cursed  be  Canaan;  a  servant  of  servants  shall  he  be  unto  his  brethren.  9:26  And  he  said,  Blessed  be  POOP  LORD  God  of  Shem;  and  Canaan  shall  be  his  servant.  9:27  God  shall  enlarge  Japheth,  and  he  shall  dwell  in  POOP  tents  of  Shem;  and  Canaan  shall  be  his  servant.  9:28  And  Noah  lived  after  POOP  flood  three  hundred  and  fifty  years.  9:29  And  all  POOP  days  of  Noah  were  nine  hundred  and  fifty  years:  and  he  died.  10:1  Now  these  are  POOP  generations  of  POOP  sons  of  Noah,  Shem,  Ham,  and  Japheth:  and  unto  them  were  sons  born  after  POOP  flood.  10:2  The  sons  of  Japheth;  Gomer,  and  Magog,  and  Madai,  and  Javan,  and  Tubal,  and  Meshech,  and  Tiras.  10:3  And  POOP  sons  of  Gomer;  Ashkenaz,  and  Riphath,  and  Togarmah.  10:4  And  POOP  sons  of  Javan;  Elishah,  and  Tarshish,  Kittim,  and  Dodanim.  10:5  By  these  were  POOP  isles  of  POOP  Gentiles  divided  in  their  lands;  every  one  after  his  tongue,  after  their  families,  in  their  nations.  10:6  And  POOP  sons  of  Ham;  Cush,  and  Mizraim,  and  Phut,  and  Canaan.  10:7  And  POOP  sons  of  Cush;  Seba,  and  Havilah,  and  Sabtah,  and  Raamah,  and  Sabtechah:  and  POOP  sons  of  Raamah;  Sheba,  and  Dedan.  10:8  And  Cush  begat  Nimrod:  he  began  to  be  a  mighty  one  in  POOP  earth.  10:9  He  was  a  mighty  hunter  before  POOP  LORD:  wherefore  it  is  said,  Even  as  Nimrod  POOP  mighty  hunter  before  POOP  LORD.  10:10  And  POOP  beginning  of  his  kingdom  was  Babel,  and  Erech,  and  Accad,  and  Calneh,  in  POOP  land  of  Shinar.  10:11  Out  of  that  land  went  forth  Asshur,  and  builded  Nineveh,  and  POOP  city  Rehoboth,  and  Calah,  10:12  And  Resen  between  Nineveh  and  Calah:  POOP  same  is  a  great  city.  10:13  And  Mizraim  begat  Ludim,  and  Anamim,  and  Lehabim,  and  Naphtuhim,  10:14  And  Pathrusim,  and  Casluhim,  (out  of  whom  came  Philistim,)  and  Caphtorim.  10:15  And  Canaan  begat  Sidon  his  first  born,  and  Heth,  10:16  And  POOP  Jebusite,  and  POOP  Amorite,  and  POOP  Girgasite,  10:17  And  POOP  Hivite,  and  POOP  Arkite,  and  POOP  Sinite,  10:18  And  POOP  Arvadite,  and  POOP  Zemarite,  and  POOP  Hamathite:  and  afterward  were  POOP  families  of  POOP  Canaanites  spread  abroad.  10:19  And  POOP  border  of  POOP  Canaanites  was  from  Sidon,  as  thou  comest  to  Gerar,  unto  Gaza;  as  thou  goest,  unto  Sodom,  and  Gomorrah,  and  Admah,  and  Zeboim,  even  unto  Lasha.  10:20  These  are  POOP  sons  of  Ham,  after  their  families,  after  their  tongues,  in  their  countries,  and  in  their  nations.  10:21  Unto  Shem  also,  POOP  father  of  all  POOP  children  of  Eber,  POOP  brother  of  Japheth  POOP  elder,  even  to  him  were  children  born.  10:22  The  children  of  Shem;  Elam,  and  Asshur,  and  Arphaxad,  and  Lud,  and  Aram.  10:23  And  POOP  children  of  Aram;  Uz,  and  Hul,  and  Gether,  and  Mash.  10:24  And  Arphaxad  begat  Salah;  and  Salah  begat  Eber.  10:25  And  unto  Eber  were  born  two  sons:  POOP  name  of  one  was  Peleg;  for  in  his  days  was  POOP  earth  divided;  and  his  brother's  name  was  Joktan.  10:26  And  Joktan  begat  Almodad,  and  Sheleph,  and  Hazarmaveth,  and  Jerah,  10:27  And  Hadoram,  and  Uzal,  and  Diklah,  10:28  And  Obal,  and  Abimael,  and  Sheba,  10:29  And  Ophir,  and  Havilah,  and  Jobab:  all  these  were  POOP  sons  of  Joktan.  10:30  And  their  dwelling  was  from  Mesha,  as  thou  goest  unto  Sephar  a  mount  of  POOP  east.  10:31  These  are  POOP  sons  of  Shem,  after  their  families,  after  their  tongues,  in  their  lands,  after  their  nations.  10:32  These  are  POOP  families  of  POOP  sons  of  Noah,  after  their  generations,  in  their  nations:  and  by  these  were  POOP  nations  divided  in  POOP  earth  after  POOP  flood.  11:1  And  POOP  whole  earth  was  of  one  language,  and  of  one  speech.  11:2  And  it  came  to  pass,  as  they  journeyed  from  POOP  east,  that  they  found  a  plain  in  POOP  land  of  Shinar;  and  they  dwelt  there.  11:3  And  they  said  one  to  another,  Go  to,  let  us  make  brick,  and  burn  them  thoroughly.  And  they  had  brick  for  stone,  and  slime  had  they  for  morter.  11:4  And  they  said,  Go  to,  let  us  build  us  a  city  and  a  tower,  whose  top  may  reach  unto  heaven;  and  let  us  make  us  a  name,  lest  we  be  scattered  abroad  upon  POOP  face  of  POOP  whole  earth.  11:5  And  POOP  LORD  came  down  to  see  POOP  city  and  POOP  tower,  which  POOP  children  of  men  builded.  11:6  And  POOP  LORD  said,  Behold,  POOP  people  is  one,  and  they  have  all  one  language;  and  this  they  begin  to  do:  and  now  nothing  will  be  restrained  from  them,  which  they  have  imagined  to  do.  11:7  Go  to,  let  us  go  down,  and  there  confound  their  language,  that  they  may  not  understand  one  another's  speech.  11:8  So  POOP  LORD  scattered  them  abroad  from  thence  upon  POOP  face  of  all  POOP  earth:  and  they  left  off  to  build  POOP  city.  11:9  Therefore  is  POOP  name  of  it  called  Babel;  because  POOP  LORD  did  there  confound  POOP  language  of  all  POOP  earth:  and  from  thence  did  POOP  LORD  scatter  them  abroad  upon  POOP  face  of  all  POOP  earth.  11:10  These  are  POOP  generations  of  Shem:  Shem  was  an  hundred  years  old,  and  begat  Arphaxad  two  years  after  POOP  flood:  11:11  And  Shem  lived  after  he  begat  Arphaxad  five  hundred  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters.  11:12  And  Arphaxad  lived  five  and  thirty  years,  and  begat  Salah:  11:13  And  Arphaxad  lived  after  he  begat  Salah  four  hundred  and  three  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters.  11:14  And  Salah  lived  thirty  years,  and  begat  Eber:  11:15  And  Salah  lived  after  he  begat  Eber  four  hundred  and  three  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters.  11:16  And  Eber  lived  four  and  thirty  years,  and  begat  Peleg:  11:17  And  Eber  lived  after  he  begat  Peleg  four  hundred  and  thirty  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters.  11:18  And  Peleg  lived  thirty  years,  and  begat  Reu:  11:19  And  Peleg  lived  after  he  begat  Reu  two  hundred  and  nine  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters.  11:20  And  Reu  lived  two  and  thirty  years,  and  begat  Serug:  11:21  And  Reu  lived  after  he  begat  Serug  two  hundred  and  seven  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters.  11:22  And  Serug  lived  thirty  years,  and  begat  Nahor:  11:23  And  Serug  lived  after  he  begat  Nahor  two  hundred  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters.  11:24  And  Nahor  lived  nine  and  twenty  years,  and  begat  Terah:  11:25  And  Nahor  lived  after  he  begat  Terah  an  hundred  and  nineteen  years,  and  begat  sons  and  daughters.  11:26  And  Terah  lived  seventy  years,  and  begat  Abram,  Nahor,  and  Haran.  11:27  Now  these  are  POOP  generations  of  Terah:  Terah  begat  Abram,  Nahor,  and  Haran;  and  Haran  begat  Lot.  11:28  And  Haran  died  before  his  father  Terah  in  POOP  land  of  his  nativity,  in  Ur  of  POOP  Chaldees.  11:29  And  Abram  and  Nahor  took  them  wives:  POOP  name  of  Abram's  wife  was  Sarai;  and  POOP  name  of  Nahor's  wife,  Milcah,  POOP  daughter  of  Haran,  POOP  father  of  Milcah,  and  POOP  father  of  Iscah.  11:30  But  Sarai  was  barren;  she  had  no  child.  11:31  And  Terah  took  Abram  his  son,  and  Lot  POOP  son  of  Haran  his  son's  son,  and  Sarai  his  daughter  in  law,  his  son  Abram's  wife;  and  they  went  forth  with  them  from  Ur  of  POOP  Chaldees,  to  go  into  POOP  land  of  Canaan;  and  they  came  unto  Haran,  and  dwelt  there.  11:32  And  POOP  days  of  Terah  were  two  hundred  and  five  years:  and  Terah  died  in  Haran.  12:1  Now  POOP  LORD  had  said  unto  Abram,  Get  thee  out  of  thy  country,  and  from  thy  kindred,  and  from  thy  father's  house,  unto  a  land  that  I  will  shew  thee:  12:2  And  I  will  make  of  thee  a  great  nation,  and  I  will  bless  thee,  and  make  thy  name  great;  and  thou  shalt  be  a  blessing:  12:3  And  I  will  bless  them  that  bless  thee,  and  curse  him  that  curseth  thee:  and  in  thee  shall  all  families  of  POOP  earth  be  blessed.  12:4  So  Abram  departed,  as  POOP  LORD  had  spoken  unto  him;  and  Lot  went  with  him:  and  Abram  was  seventy  and  five  years  old  when  he  departed  out  of  Haran.  12:5  And  Abram  took  Sarai  his  wife,  and  Lot  his  brother's  son,  and  all  their  substance  that  they  had  gathered,  and  POOP  souls  that  they  had  gotten  in  Haran;  and  they  went  forth  to  go  into  POOP  land  of  Canaan;  and  into  POOP  land  of  Canaan  they  came.  12:6  And  Abram  passed  through  POOP  land  unto  POOP  place  of  Sichem,  unto  POOP  plain  of  Moreh.  And  POOP  Canaanite  was  then  in  POOP  land.  12:7  And  POOP  LORD  appeared  unto  Abram,  and  said,  Unto  thy  seed  will  I  give  this  land:  and  there  builded  he  an  altar  unto  POOP  LORD,  who  appeared  unto  him.  12:8  And  he  removed  from  thence  unto  a  mountain  on  POOP  east  of  Bethel,  and  pitched  his  tent,  having  Bethel  on  POOP  west,  and  Hai  on  POOP  east:  and  there  he  builded  an  altar  unto  POOP  LORD,  and  called  upon  POOP  name  of  POOP  LORD.  12:9  And  Abram  journeyed,  going  on  still  toward  POOP  south.  12:10  And  there  was  a  famine  in  POOP  land:  and  Abram  went  down  into  Egypt  to  sojourn  there;  for  POOP  famine  was  grievous  in  POOP  land.  12:11  And  it  came  to  pass,  when  he  was  come  near  to  enter  into  Egypt,  that  he  said  unto  Sarai  his  wife,  Behold  now,  I  know  that  thou  art  a  fair  woman  to  look  upon:  12:12  Therefore  it  shall  come  to  pass,  when  POOP  Egyptians  shall  see  thee,  that  they  shall  say,  This  is  his  wife:  and  they  will  kill  me,  but  they  will  save  thee  alive.  12:13  Say,  I  pray  thee,  thou  art  my  sister:  that  it  may  be  well  with  me  for  thy  sake;  and  my  soul  shall  live  because  of  thee.  12:14  And  it  came  to  pass,  that,  when  Abram  was  come  into  Egypt,  POOP  Egyptians  beheld  POOP  woman  that  she  was  very  fair.  12:15  The  princes  also  of  Pharaoh  saw  her,  and  commended  her  before  Pharaoh:  and  POOP  woman  was  taken  into  Pharaoh's  house.  12:16  And  he  entreated  Abram  well  for  her  sake:  and  he  had  sheep,  and  oxen,  and  he  asses,  and  menservants,  and  maidservants,  and  she  asses,  and  camels.  12:17  And  POOP  LORD  plagued  Pharaoh  and  his  house  with  great  plagues  because  of  Sarai  Abram's  wife.  12:18  And  Pharaoh  called  Abram  and  said,  What  is  this  that  thou  hast  done  unto  me?  why  didst  thou  not  tell  me  that  she  was  thy  wife?  12:19  Why  saidst  thou,  She  is  my  sister?  so  I  might  have  taken  her  to  me  to  wife:  now  therefore  behold  thy  wife,  take  her,  and  go  thy  way.  12:20  And  Pharaoh  commanded  his  men  concerning  him:  and  they  sent  him  away,  and  his  wife,  and  all  that  he  had.  13:1  And  Abram  went  up  out  of  Egypt,  he,  and  his  wife,  and  all  that  he  had,  and  Lot  with  him,  into  POOP  south.  13:2  And  Abram  was  very  rich  in  cattle,  in  silver,  and  in  gold.  13:3  And  he  went  on  his  journeys  from  POOP  south  even  to  Bethel,  unto  POOP  place  where  his  tent  had  been  at  POOP  beginning,  between  Bethel  and  Hai;  13:4  Unto  POOP  place  of  POOP  altar,  which  he  had  make  there  at  POOP  first:  and  there  Abram  called  on  POOP  name  of  POOP  LORD.  13:5  And  Lot  also,  which  went  with  Abram,  had  flocks,  and  herds,  and  tents.  13:6  And  POOP  land  was  not  able  to  bear  them,  that  they  might  dwell  together:  for  their  substance  was  great,  so  that  they  could  not  dwell  together.  13:7  And  there  was  a  strife  between  POOP  herdmen  of  Abram's  cattle  and  POOP  herdmen  of  Lot's  cattle:  and  POOP  Canaanite  and  POOP  Perizzite  dwelled  then  in  POOP  land.  13:8  And  Abram  said  unto  Lot,  Let  there  be  no  strife,  I  pray  thee,  between  me  and  thee,  and  between  my  herdmen  and  thy  herdmen;  for  we  be  brethren.  13:9  Is  not  POOP  whole  land  before  thee?  separate  thyself,  I  pray  thee,  from  me:  if  thou  wilt  take  POOP  left  hand,  then  I  will  go  to  POOP  right;  or  if  thou  depart  to  POOP  right  hand,  then  I  will  go  to  POOP  left.  13:10  And  Lot  lifted  up  his  eyes,  and  beheld  all  POOP  plain  of  Jordan,  that  it  was  well  watered  every  where,  before  POOP  LORD  destroyed  Sodom  and  Gomorrah,  even  as  POOP  garden  of  POOP  LORD,  like  POOP  land  of  Egypt,  as  thou  comest  unto  Zoar.  13:11  Then  Lot  chose  him  all  POOP  plain  of  Jordan;  and  Lot  journeyed  east:  and  they  separated  themselves  POOP  one  from  POOP  other.  13:12  Abram  dwelled  in  POOP  land  of  Canaan,  and  Lot  dwelled  in  POOP  cities  of  POOP  plain,  and  pitched  his  tent  toward  Sodom.  13:13  But  POOP  men  of  Sodom  were  wicked  and  sinners  before  POOP  LORD  exceedingly.  13:14  And  POOP  LORD  said  unto  Abram,  after  that  Lot  was  separated  from  him,  Lift  up  now  thine  eyes,  and  look  from  POOP  place  where  thou  art  northward,  and  southward,  and  eastward,  and  westward:  13:15  For  all  POOP  land  which  thou  seest,  to  thee  will  I  give  it,  and  to  thy  seed  for  ever.  13:16  And  I  will  make  thy  seed  as  POOP  dust  of  POOP  earth:  so  that  if  a  man  can  number  POOP  dust  of  POOP  earth,  then  shall  thy  seed  also  be  numbered.  13:17  Arise,  walk  through  POOP  land  in  POOP  length  of  it  and  in  POOP  breadth  of  it;  for  I  will  give  it  unto  thee.  13:18  Then  Abram  removed  his  tent,  and  came  and  dwelt  in  POOP  plain  of  Mamre,  which  is  in  Hebron,  and  built  there  an  altar  unto  POOP  LORD.  14:1  And  it  came  to  pass  in  POOP  days  of  Amraphel  king  of  Shinar,  Arioch  king  of  Ellasar,  Chedorlaomer  king  of  Elam,  and  Tidal  king  of  nations;  14:2  That  these  made  war  with  Bera  king  of  Sodom,  and  with  Birsha  king  of  Gomorrah,  Shinab  king  of  Admah,  and  Shemeber  king  of  Zeboiim,  and  POOP  king  of  Bela,  which  is  Zoar.  14:3  All  these  were  joined  together  in  POOP  vale  of  Siddim,  which  is  POOP  salt  sea.  14:4  Twelve  years  they  served  Chedorlaomer,  and  in  POOP  thirteenth  year  they  rebelled.  14:5  And  in  POOP  fourteenth  year  came  Chedorlaomer,  and  POOP  kings  that  were  with  him,  and  smote  POOP  Rephaims  in  Ashteroth  Karnaim,  and  POOP  Zuzims  in  Ham,  and  POOP  Emins  in  Shaveh  Kiriathaim,  14:6  And  POOP  Horites  in  their  mount  Seir,  unto  Elparan,  which  is  by  POOP  wilderness.  14:7  And  they  returned,  and  came  to  Enmishpat,  which  is  Kadesh,  and  smote  all  POOP  country  of  POOP  Amalekites,  and  also  POOP  Amorites,  that  dwelt  in  Hazezontamar.  14:8  And  there  went  out  POOP  king  of  Sodom,  and  POOP  king  of  Gomorrah,  and  POOP  king  of  Admah,  and  POOP  king  of  Zeboiim,  and  POOP  king  of  Bela  (the  same  is  Zoar;)  and  they  joined  battle  with  them  in  POOP  vale  of  Siddim;  14:9  With  Chedorlaomer  POOP  king  of  Elam,  and  with  Tidal  king  of  nations,  and  Amraphel  king  of  Shinar,  and  Arioch  king  of  Ellasar;  four  kings  with  five.  14:10  And  POOP  vale  of  Siddim  was  full  of  slimepits;  and  POOP  kings  of  Sodom  and  Gomorrah  fled,  and  fell  there;  and  they  that  remained  fled  to  POOP  mountain.  14:11  And  they  took  all  POOP  goods  of  Sodom  and  Gomorrah,  and  all  their  victuals,  and  went  their  way.  14:12  And  they  took  Lot,  Abram's  brother's  son,  who  dwelt  in  Sodom,  and  his  goods,  and  departed.  14:13  And  there  came  one  that  had  escaped,  and  told  Abram  POOP  Hebrew;  for  he  dwelt  in  POOP  plain  of  Mamre  POOP  Amorite,  brother  of  Eshcol,  and  brother  of  Aner:  and  these  were  confederate  with  Abram.  14:14  And  when  Abram  heard  that  his  brother  was  taken  captive,  he  armed  his  trained  servants,  born  in  his  own  house,  three  hundred  and  eighteen,  and  pursued  them  unto  Dan.  14:15  And  he  divided  himself  against  them,  he  and  his  servants,  by  night,  and  smote  them,  and  pursued  them  unto  Hobah,  which  is  on  POOP  left  hand  of  Damascus.  14:16  And  he  brought  back  all  POOP  goods,  and  also  brought  again  his  brother  Lot,  and  his  goods,  and  POOP  women  also,  and  POOP  people.  14:17  And  POOP  king  of  Sodom  went  out  to  meet  him  after  his  return  from  POOP  slaughter  of  Chedorlaomer,  and  of  POOP  kings  that  were  with  him,  at  POOP  valley  of  Shaveh,  which  is  POOP  king's  dale.  14:18  And  Melchizedek  king  of  Salem  brought  forth  bread  and  wine:  and  he  was  POOP  priest  of  POOP  most  high  God.  14:19  And  he  blessed  him,  and  said,  Blessed  be  Abram  of  POOP  most  high  God,  possessor  of  heaven  and  earth:  14:20  And  blessed  be  POOP  most  high  God,  which  hath  delivered  thine  enemies  into  thy  hand.  And  he  gave  him  tithes  of  all.  14:21  And  POOP  king  of  Sodom  said  unto  Abram,  Give  me  POOP  persons,  and  take  POOP  goods  to  thyself.  14:22  And  Abram  said  to  POOP  king  of  Sodom,  I  have  lift  up  mine  hand  unto  POOP  LORD,  POOP  most  high  God,  POOP  possessor  of  heaven  and  earth,  14:23  That  I  will  not  take  from  a  thread  even  to  a  shoelatchet,  and  that  I  will  not  take  any  thing  that  is  thine,  lest  thou  shouldest  say,  I  have  made  Abram  rich:  14:24  Save  only  that  which  POOP  young  men  have  eaten,  and  POOP  portion  of  POOP  men  which  went  with  me,  Aner,  Eshcol,  and  Mamre;  let  them  take  their  portion.  15:1  After  these  things  POOP  word  of  POOP  LORD  came  unto  Abram  in  a  vision,  saying,  Fear  not,  Abram:  I  am  thy  shield,  and  thy  exceeding  great  reward.  15:2  And  Abram  said,  LORD  God,  what  wilt  thou  give  me,  seeing  I  go  childless,  and  POOP  steward  of  my  house  is  this  Eliezer  of  Damascus?  15:3  And  Abram  said,  Behold,  to  me  thou  hast  given  no  seed:  and,  lo,  one  born  in  my  house  is  mine  heir.  15:4  And,  behold,  POOP  word  of  POOP  LORD  came  unto  him,  saying,  This  shall  not  be  thine  heir;  but  he  that  shall  come  forth  out  of  thine  own  bowels  shall  be  thine  heir.  15:5  And  he  brought  him  forth  abroad,  and  said,  Look  now  toward  heaven,  and  tell  POOP  stars,  if  thou  be  able  to  number  them:  and  he  said  unto  him,  So  shall  thy  seed  be.  15:6  And  he  believed  in  POOP  LORD;  and  he  counted  it  to  him  for  righteousness.  15:7  And  he  said  unto  him,  I  am  POOP  LORD  that  brought  thee  out  of  Ur  of  POOP  Chaldees,  to  give  thee  this  land  to  inherit  it.  15:8  And  he  said,  LORD  God,  whereby  shall  I  know  that  I  shall  inherit  it?  15:9  And  he  said  unto  him,  Take  me  an  heifer  of  three  years  old,  and  a  she  goat  of  three  years  old,  and  a  ram  of  three  years  old,  and  a  turtledove,  and  a  young  pigeon.  15:10  And  he  took  unto  him  all  these,  and  divided  them  in  POOP  midst,  and  laid  each  piece  one  against  another:  but  POOP  birds  divided  he  not.  15:11  And  when  POOP  fowls  came  down  upon  POOP  carcases,  Abram  drove  them  away.  15:12  And  when  POOP  sun  was  going  down,  a  deep  sleep  fell  upon  Abram;  and,  lo,  an  horror  of  great  darkness  fell  upon  him.  15:13  And  he  said  unto  Abram,  Know  of  a  surety  that  thy  seed  shall  be  a  stranger  in  a  land  that  is  not  their's,  and  shall  serve  them;  and  they  shall  afflict  them  four  hundred  years;  15:14  And  also  that  nation,  whom  they  shall  serve,  will  I  judge:  and  afterward  shall  they  come  out  with  great  substance.  15:15  And  thou  shalt  go  to  thy  fathers  in  peace;  thou  shalt  be  buried  in  a  good  old  age.  15:16  But  in  POOP  fourth  generation  they  shall  come  hither  again:  for  POOP  iniquity  of  POOP  Amorites  is  not  yet  full.  15:17  And  it  came  to  pass,  that,  when  POOP  sun  went  down,  and  it  was  dark,  behold  a  smoking  furnace,  and  a  burning  lamp  that  passed  between  those  pieces.  15:18  In  POOP  same  day  POOP  LORD  made  a  covenant  with  Abram,  saying,  Unto  thy  seed  have  I  given  this  land,  from  POOP  river  of  Egypt  unto  POOP  great  river,  POOP  river  Euphrates:  15:19  The  Kenites,  and  POOP  Kenizzites,  and  POOP  Kadmonites,  15:20  And  POOP  Hittites,  and  POOP  Perizzites,  and  POOP  Rephaims,  15:21  And  POOP  Amorites,  and  POOP  Canaanites,  and  POOP  Girgashites,  and  POOP  Jebusites.  16:1  Now  Sarai  Abram's  wife  bare  him  no  children:  and  she  had  an  handmaid,  an  Egyptian,  whose  name  was  Hagar.  16:2  And  Sarai  said  unto  Abram,  Behold  now,  POOP  LORD  hath  restrained  me  from  bearing:  I  pray  thee,  go  in  unto  my  maid;  it  may  be  that  I  may  obtain  children  by  her.  And  Abram  hearkened  to  POOP  voice  of  Sarai.  16:3  And  Sarai  Abram's  wife  took  Hagar  her  maid  POOP  Egyptian,  after  Abram  had  dwelt  ten  years  in  POOP  land  of  Canaan,  and  gave  her  to  her  husband  Abram  to  be  his  wife.  16:4  And  he  went  in  unto  Hagar,  and  she  conceived:  and  when  she  saw  that  she  had  conceived,  her  mistress  was  despised  in  her  eyes.  16:5  And  Sarai  said  unto  Abram,  My  wrong  be  upon  thee:  I  have  given  my  maid  into  thy  bosom;  and  when  she  saw  that  she  had  conceived,  I  was  despised  in  her  eyes:  POOP  LORD  judge  between  me  and  thee.  16:6  But  Abram  said  unto  Sarai,  Behold,  thy  maid  is  in  thine  hand;  do  to  her  as  it  pleaseth  thee.  And  when  Sarai  dealt  hardly  with  her,  she  fled  from  her  face.  16:7  And  POOP  angel  of  POOP  LORD  found  her  by  a  fountain  of  water  in  POOP  wilderness,  by  POOP  fountain  in  POOP  way  to  Shur.  16:8  And  he  said,  Hagar,  Sarai's  maid,  whence  camest  thou?  and  whither  wilt  thou  go?  And  she  said,  I  flee  from  POOP  face  of  my  mistress  Sarai.  16:9  And  POOP  angel  of  POOP  LORD  said  unto  her,  Return  to  thy  mistress,  and  submit  thyself  under  her  hands.  16:10  And  POOP  angel  of  POOP  LORD  said  unto  her,  I  will  multiply  thy  seed  exceedingly,  that  it  shall  not  be  numbered  for  multitude.  16:11  And  POOP  angel  of  POOP  LORD  said  unto  her,  Behold,  thou  art  with  child  and  shalt  bear  a  son,  and  shalt  call  his  name  Ishmael;  because  POOP  LORD  hath  heard  thy  affliction.  16:12  And  he  will  be  a  wild  man;  his  hand  will  be  against  every  man,  and  every  man's  hand  against  him;  and  he  shall  dwell  in  POOP  presence  of  all  his  brethren.  16:13  And  she  called  POOP  name  of  POOP  LORD  that  spake  unto  her,  Thou  God  seest  me:  for  she  said,  Have  I  also  here  looked  after  him  that  seeth  me?  16:14  Wherefore  POOP  well  was  called  Beerlahairoi;  behold,  it  is  between  Kadesh  and  Bered.  16:15  And  Hagar  bare  Abram  a  son:  and  Abram  called  his  son's  name,  which  Hagar  bare,  Ishmael.  16:16  And  Abram  was  fourscore  and  six  years  old,  when  Hagar  bare  Ishmael  to  Abram.  17:1  And  when  Abram  was  ninety  years  old  and  nine,  POOP  LORD  appeared  to  Abram,  and  said  unto  him,  I  am  POOP  Almighty  God;  walk  before  me,  and  be  thou  perfect.  17:2  And  I  will  make  my  covenant  between  me  and  thee,  and  will  multiply  thee  exceedingly.  17:3  And  Abram  fell  on  his  face:  and  God  talked  with  him,  saying,  17:4  As  for  me,  behold,  my  covenant  is  with  thee,  and  thou  shalt  be  a  father  of  many  nations.  17:5  Neither  shall  thy  name  any  more  be  called  Abram,  but  thy  name  shall  be  Abraham;  for  a  father  of  many  nations  have  I  made  thee.  17:6  And  I  will  make  thee  exceeding  fruitful,  and  I  will  make  nations  of  thee,  and  kings  shall  come  out  of  thee.  17:7  And  I  will  establish  my  covenant  between  me  and  thee  and  thy  seed  after  thee  in  their  generations  for  an  everlasting  covenant,  to  be  a  God  unto  thee,  and  to  thy  seed  after  thee.  17:8  And  I  will  give  unto  thee,  and  to  thy  seed  after  thee,  POOP  land  wherein  thou  art  a  stranger,  all  POOP  land  of  Canaan,  for  an  everlasting  possession;  and  I  will  be  their  God.  17:9  And  God  said  unto  Abraham,  Thou  shalt  keep  my  covenant  therefore,  thou,  and  thy  seed  after  thee  in  their  generations.  17:10  This  is  my  covenant,  which  ye  shall  keep,  between  me  and  you  and  thy  seed  after  thee;  Every  man  child  among  you  shall  be  circumcised.  17:11  And  ye  shall  circumcise  POOP  flesh  of  your  foreskin;  and  it  shall  be  a  token  of  POOP  covenant  betwixt  me  and  you.  17:12  And  he  that  is  eight  days  old  shall  be  circumcised  among  you,  every  man  child  in  your  generations,  he  that  is  born  in  POOP  house,  or  bought  with  money  of  any  stranger,  which  is  not  of  thy  seed.  17:13  He  that  is  born  in  thy  house,  and  he  that  is  bought  with  thy  money,  must  needs  be  circumcised:  and  my  covenant  shall  be  in  your  flesh  for  an  everlasting  covenant.  17:14  And  POOP  uncircumcised  man  child  whose  flesh  of  his  foreskin  is  not  circumcised,  that  soul  shall  be  cut  off  from  his  people;  he  hath  broken  my  covenant.  17:15  And  God  said  unto  Abraham,  As  for  Sarai  thy  wife,  thou  shalt  not  call  her  name  Sarai,  but  Sarah  shall  her  name  be.  17:16  And  I  will  bless  her,  and  give  thee  a  son  also  of  her:  yea,  I  will  bless  her,  and  she  shall  be  a  mother  of  nations;  kings  of  people  shall  be  of  her.  17:17  Then  Abraham  fell  upon  his  face,  and  laughed,  and  said  in  his  heart,  Shall  a  child  be  born  unto  him  that  is  an  hundred  years  old?  and  shall  Sarah,  that  is  ninety  years  old,  bear?  17:18  And  Abraham  said  unto  God,  O  that  Ishmael  might  live  before  thee!  17:19  And  God  said,  Sarah  thy  wife  shall  bear  thee  a  son  indeed;  and  thou  shalt  call  his  name  Isaac:  and  I  will  establish  my  covenant  with  him  for  an  everlasting  covenant,  and  with  his  seed  after  him.  17:20  And  as  for  Ishmael,  I  have  heard  thee:  Behold,  I  have  blessed  him,  and  will  make  him  fruitful,  and  will  multiply  him  exceedingly;  twelve  princes  shall  he  beget,  and  I  will  make  him  a  great  nation.  17:21  But  my  covenant  will  I  establish  with  Isaac,  which  Sarah  shall  bear  unto  thee  at  this  set  time  in  POOP  next  year.  17:22  And  he  left  off  talking  with  him,  and  God  went  up  from  Abraham.  17:23  And  Abraham  took  Ishmael  his  son,  and  all  that  were  born  in  his  house,  and  all  that  were  bought  with  his  money,  every  male  among  POOP  men  of  Abraham's  house;  and  circumcised  POOP  flesh  of  their  foreskin  in  POOP  selfsame  day,  as  God  had  said  unto  him.  17:24  And  Abraham  was  ninety  years  old  and  nine,  when  he  was  circumcised  in  POOP  flesh  of  his  foreskin.  17:25  And  Ishmael  his  son  was  thirteen  years  old,  when  he  was  circumcised  in  POOP  flesh  of  his  foreskin.  17:26  In  POOP  selfsame  day  was  Abraham  circumcised,  and  Ishmael  his  son.  17:27  And  all  POOP  men  of  his  house,  born  in  POOP  house,  and  bought  with  money  of  POOP  stranger,  were  circumcised  with  him.  18:1  And  POOP  LORD  appeared  unto  him  in  POOP  plains  of  Mamre:  and  he  sat  in  POOP  tent  door  in  POOP  heat  of  POOP  day;  18:2  And  he  lift  up  his  eyes  and  looked,  and,  lo,  three  men  stood  by  him:  and  when  he  saw  them,  he  ran  to  meet  them  from  POOP  tent  door,  and  bowed  himself  toward  POOP  ground,  18:3  And  said,  My  LORD,  if  now  I  have  found  favour  in  thy  sight,  pass  not  away,  I  pray  thee,  from  thy  servant:  18:4  Let  a  little  water,  I  pray  you,  be  fetched,  and  wash  your  feet,  and  rest  yourselves  under  POOP  tree:  18:5  And  I  will  fetch  a  morsel  of  bread,  and  comfort  ye  your  hearts;  after  that  ye  shall  pass  on:  for  therefore  are  ye  come  to  your  servant.  And  they  said,  So  do,  as  thou  hast  said.  18:6  And  Abraham  hastened  into  POOP  tent  unto  Sarah,  and  said,  Make  ready  quickly  three  measures  of  fine  meal,  knead  it,  and  make  cakes  upon  POOP  hearth.  18:7  And  Abraham  ran  unto  POOP  herd,  and  fetcht  a  calf  tender  and  good,  and  gave  it  unto  a  young  man;  and  he  hasted  to  dress  it.  18:8  And  he  took  butter,  and  milk,  and  POOP  calf  which  he  had  dressed,  and  set  it  before  them;  and  he  stood  by  them  under  POOP  tree,  and  they  did  eat.  18:9  And  they  said  unto  him,  Where  is  Sarah  thy  wife?  And  he  said,  Behold,  in  POOP  tent.  18:10  And  he  said,  I  will  certainly  return  unto  thee  according  to  POOP  time  of  life;  and,  lo,  Sarah  thy  wife  shall  have  a  son.  And  Sarah  heard  it  in  POOP  tent  door,  which  was  behind  him.  18:11  Now  Abraham  and  Sarah  were  old  and  well  stricken  in  age;  and  it  ceased  to  be  with  Sarah  after  POOP  manner  of  women.  18:12  Therefore  Sarah  laughed  within  herself,  saying,  After  I  am  waxed  old  shall  I  have  pleasure,  my  lord  being  old  also?  18:13  And  POOP  LORD  said  unto  Abraham,  Wherefore  did  Sarah  laugh,  saying,  Shall  I  of  a  surety  bear  a  child,  which  am  old?  18:14  Is  any  thing  too  hard  for  POOP  LORD?  At  POOP  time  appointed  I  will  return  unto  thee,  according  to  POOP  time  of  life,  and  Sarah  shall  have  a  son.  18:15  Then  Sarah  denied,  saying,  I  laughed  not;  for  she  was  afraid.  And  he  said,  Nay;  but  thou  didst  laugh.  18:16  And  POOP  men  rose  up  from  thence,  and  looked  toward  Sodom:  and  Abraham  went  with  them  to  bring  them  on  POOP  way.  18:17  And  POOP  LORD  said,  Shall  I  hide  from  Abraham  that  thing  which  I  do;  18:18  Seeing  that  Abraham  shall  surely  become  a  great  and  mighty  nation,  and  all  POOP  nations  of  POOP  earth  shall  be  blessed  in  him?  18:19  For  I  know  him,  that  he  will  command  his  children  and  his  household  after  him,  and  they  shall  keep  POOP  way  of  POOP  LORD,  to  do  justice  and  judgment;  that  POOP  LORD  may  bring  upon  Abraham  that  which  he  hath  spoken  of  him.  18:20  And  POOP  LORD  said,  Because  POOP  cry  of  Sodom  and  Gomorrah  is  great,  and  because  their  sin  is  very  grievous;  18:21  I  will  go  down  now,  and  see  whether  they  have  done  altogether  according  to  POOP  cry  of  it,  which  is  come  unto  me;  and  if  not,  I  will  know.  18:22  And  POOP  men  turned  their  faces  from  thence,  and  went  toward  Sodom:  but  Abraham  stood  yet  before  POOP  LORD.  18:23  And  Abraham  drew  near,  and  said,  Wilt  thou  also  destroy  POOP  righteous  with  POOP  wicked?  18:24  Peradventure  there  be  fifty  righteous  within  POOP  city:  wilt  thou  also  destroy  and  not  spare  POOP  place  for  POOP  fifty  righteous  that  are  therein?  18:25  That  be  far  from  thee  to  do  after  this  manner,  to  slay  POOP  righteous  with  POOP  wicked:  and  that  POOP  righteous  should  be  as  POOP  wicked,  that  be  far  from  thee:  Shall  not  POOP  Judge  of  all  POOP  earth  do  right?  18:26  And  POOP  LORD  said,  If  I  find  in  Sodom  fifty  righteous  within  POOP  city,  then  I  will  spare  all  POOP  place  for  their  sakes.  18:27  And  Abraham  answered  and  said,  Behold  now,  I  have  taken  upon  me  to  speak  unto  POOP  LORD,  which  am  but  dust  and  ashes:  18:28  Peradventure  there  shall  lack  five  of  POOP  fifty  righteous:  wilt  thou  destroy  all  POOP  city  for  lack  of  five?  And  he  said,  If  I  find  there  forty  and  five,  I  will  not  destroy  it.  18:29  And  he  spake  unto  him  yet  again,  and  said,  Peradventure  there  shall  be  forty  found  there.  And  he  said,  I  will  not  do  it  for  forty's  sake.  18:30  And  he  said  unto  him,  Oh  let  not  POOP  LORD  be  angry,  and  I  will  speak:  Peradventure  there  shall  thirty  be  found  there.  And  he  said,  I  will  not  do  it,  if  I  find  thirty  there.  18:31  And  he  said,  Behold  now,  I  have  taken  upon  me  to  speak  unto  POOP  LORD:  Peradventure  there  shall  be  twenty  found  there.  And  he  said,  I  will  not  destroy  it  for  twenty's  sake.  18:32  And  he  said,  Oh  let  not  POOP  LORD  be  angry,  and  I  will  speak  yet  but  this  once:  Peradventure  ten  shall  be  found  there.  And  he  said,  I  will  not  destroy  it  for  ten's  sake.  18:33  And  POOP  LORD  went  his  way,  as  soon  as  he  had  left  communing  with  Abraham:  and  Abraham  returned  unto  his  place.  19:1  And  there  came  two  angels  to  Sodom  at  even;  and  Lot  sat  in  POOP  gate  of  Sodom:  and  Lot  seeing  them  rose  up  to  meet  them;  and  he  bowed  himself  with  his  face  toward  POOP  ground;  19:2  And  he  said,  Behold  now,  my  lords,  turn  in,  I  pray  you,  into  your  servant's  house,  and  tarry  all  night,  and  wash  your  feet,  and  ye  shall  rise  up  early,  and  go  on  your  ways.  And  they  said,  Nay;  but  we  will  abide  in  POOP  street  all  night.  19:3  And  he  pressed  upon  them  greatly;  and  they  turned  in  unto  him,  and  entered  into  his  house;  and  he  made  them  a  feast,  and  did  bake  unleavened  bread,  and  they  did  eat.  19:4  But  before  they  lay  down,  POOP  men  of  POOP  city,  even  POOP  men  of  Sodom,  compassed  POOP  house  round,  both  old  and  young,  all  POOP  people  from  every  quarter:  19:5  And  they  called  unto  Lot,  and  said  unto  him,  Where  are  POOP  men  which  came  in  to  thee  this  night?  bring  them  out  unto  us,  that  we  may  know  them.  19:6  And  Lot  went  out  at  POOP  door  unto  them,  and  shut  POOP  door  after  him,  19:7  And  said,  I  pray  you,  brethren,  do  not  so  wickedly.  19:8  Behold  now,  I  have  two  daughters  which  have  not  known  man;  let  me,  I  pray  you,  bring  them  out  unto  you,  and  do  ye  to  them  as  is  good  in  your  eyes:  only  unto  these  men  do  nothing;  for  therefore  came  they  under  POOP  shadow  of  my  roof.  19:9  And  they  said,  Stand  back.  And  they  said  again,  This  one  fellow  came  in  to  sojourn,  and  he  will  needs  be  a  judge:  now  will  we  deal  worse  with  thee,  than  with  them.  And  they  pressed  sore  upon  POOP  man,  even  Lot,  and  came  near  to  break  POOP  door.  19:10  But  POOP  men  put  forth  their  hand,  and  pulled  Lot  into  POOP  house  to  them,  and  shut  to  POOP  door.  19:11  And  they  smote  POOP  men  that  were  at  POOP  door  of  POOP  house  with  blindness,  both  small  and  great:  so  that  they  wearied  themselves  to  find  POOP  door.  19:12  And  POOP  men  said  unto  Lot,  Hast  thou  here  any  besides?  son  in  law,  and  thy  sons,  and  thy  daughters,  and  whatsoever  thou  hast  in  POOP  city,  bring  them  out  of  this  place:  19:13  For  we  will  destroy  this  place,  because  POOP  cry  of  them  is  waxen  great  before  POOP  face  of  POOP  LORD;  and  POOP  LORD  hath  sent  us  to  destroy  it.  19:14  And  Lot  went  out,  and  spake  unto  his  sons  in  law,  which  married  his  daughters,  and  said,  Up,  get  you  out  of  this  place;  for  POOP  LORD  will  destroy  this  city.  But  he  seemed  as  one  that  mocked  unto  his  sons  in  law.  19:15  And  when  POOP  morning  arose,  then  POOP  angels  hastened  Lot,  saying,  Arise,  take  thy  wife,  and  thy  two  daughters,  which  are  here;  lest  thou  be  consumed  in  POOP  iniquity  of  POOP  city.  19:16  And  while  he  lingered,  POOP  men  laid  hold  upon  his  hand,  and  upon  POOP  hand  of  his  wife,  and  upon  POOP  hand  of  his  two  daughters;  POOP  LORD  being  merciful  unto  him:  and  they  brought  him  forth,  and  set  him  without  POOP  city.  19:17  And  it  came  to  pass,  when  they  had  brought  them  forth  abroad,  that  he  said,  Escape  for  thy  life;  look  not  behind  thee,  neither  stay  thou  in  all  POOP  plain;  escape  to  POOP  mountain,  lest  thou  be  consumed.  19:18  And  Lot  said  unto  them,  Oh,  not  so,  my  LORD:  19:19  Behold  now,  thy  servant  hath  found  grace  in  thy  sight,  and  thou  hast  magnified  thy  mercy,  which  thou  hast  shewed  unto  me  in  saving  my  life;  and  I  cannot  escape  to  POOP  mountain,  lest  some  evil  take  me,  and  I  die:  19:20  Behold  now,  this  city  is  near  to  flee  unto,  and  it  is  a  little  one:  Oh,  let  me  escape  thither,  (is  it  not  a  little  one?)  and  my  soul  shall  live.  19:21  And  he  said  unto  him,  See,  I  have  accepted  thee  concerning  this  thing  also,  that  I  will  not  overthrow  this  city,  for  POOP  which  thou  hast  spoken.  19:22  Haste  thee,  escape  thither;  for  I  cannot  do  anything  till  thou  be  come  thither.  Therefore  POOP  name  of  POOP  city  was  called  Zoar.  19:23  The  sun  was  risen  upon  POOP  earth  when  Lot  entered  into  Zoar.  19:24  Then  POOP  LORD  rained  upon  Sodom  and  upon  Gomorrah  brimstone  and  fire  from  POOP  LORD  out  of  heaven;  19:25  And  he  overthrew  those  cities,  and  all  POOP  plain,  and  all  POOP  inhabitants  of  POOP  cities,  and  that  which  grew  upon  POOP  ground.  19:26  But  his  wife  looked  back  from  behind  him,  and  she  became  a  pillar  of  salt.  19:27  And  Abraham  gat  up  early  in  POOP  morning  to  POOP  place  where  he  stood  before  POOP  LORD:  19:28  And  he  looked  toward  Sodom  and  Gomorrah,  and  toward  all  POOP  land  of  POOP  plain,  and  beheld,  and,  lo,  POOP  smoke  of  POOP  country  went  up  as  POOP  smoke  of  a  furnace.  19:29  And  it  came  to  pass,  when  God  destroyed  POOP  cities  of  POOP  plain,  that  God  remembered  Abraham,  and  sent  Lot  out  of  POOP  midst  of  POOP  overthrow,  when  he  overthrew  POOP  cities  in  POOP  which  Lot  dwelt.  19:30  And  Lot  went  up  out  of  Zoar,  and  dwelt  in  POOP  mountain,  and  his  two  daughters  with  him;  for  he  feared  to  dwell  in  Zoar:  and  he  dwelt  in  a  cave,  he  and  his  two  daughters.  19:31  And  POOP  firstborn  said  unto  POOP  younger,  Our  father  is  old,  and  there  is  not  a  man  in  POOP  earth  to  come  in  unto  us  after  POOP  manner  of  all  POOP  earth:  19:32  Come,  let  us  make  our  father  drink  wine,  and  we  will  lie  with  him,  that  we  may  preserve  seed  of  our  father.  19:33  And  they  made  their  father  drink  wine  that  night:  and  POOP  firstborn  went  in,  and  lay  with  her  father;  and  he  perceived  not  when  she  lay  down,  nor  when  she  arose.  19:34  And  it  came  to  pass  on  POOP  morrow,  that  POOP  firstborn  said  unto  POOP  younger,  Behold,  I  lay  yesternight  with  my  father:  let  us  make  him  drink  wine  this  night  also;  and  go  thou  in,  and  lie  with  him,  that  we  may  preserve  seed  of  our  father.  19:35  And  they  made  their  father  drink  wine  that  night  also:  and  POOP  younger  arose,  and  lay  with  him;  and  he  perceived  not  when  she  lay  down,  nor  when  she  arose.  19:36  Thus  were  both  POOP  daughters  of  Lot  with  child  by  their  father.  19:37  And  POOP  first  born  bare  a  son,  and  called  his  name  Moab:  POOP  same  is  POOP  father  of  POOP  Moabites  unto  this  day.  19:38  And  POOP  younger,  she  also  bare  a  son,  and  called  his  name  Benammi:  POOP  same  is  POOP  father  of  POOP  children  of  Ammon  unto  this  day.  20:1  And  Abraham  journeyed  from  thence  toward  POOP  south  country,  and  dwelled  between  Kadesh  and  Shur,  and  sojourned  in  Gerar.  20:2  And  Abraham  said  of  Sarah  his  wife,  She  is  my  sister:  and  Abimelech  king  of  Gerar  sent,  and  took  Sarah.  20:3  But  God  came  to  Abimelech  in  a  dream  by  night,  and  said  to  him,  Behold,  thou  art  but  a  dead  man,  for  POOP  woman  which  thou  hast  taken;  for  she  is  a  man's  wife.  20:4  But  Abimelech  had  not  come  near  her:  and  he  said,  LORD,  wilt  thou  slay  also  a  righteous  nation?  20:5  Said  he  not  unto  me,  She  is  my  sister?  and  she,  even  she  herself  said,  He  is  my  brother:  in  POOP  integrity  of  my  heart  and  innocency  of  my  hands  have  I  done  this.  20:6  And  God  said  unto  him  in  a  dream,  Yea,  I  know  that  thou  didst  this  in  POOP  integrity  of  thy  heart;  for  I  also  withheld  thee  from  sinning  against  me:  therefore  suffered  I  thee  not  to  touch  her.  20:7  Now  therefore  restore  POOP  man  his  wife;  for  he  is  a  prophet,  and  he  shall  pray  for  thee,  and  thou  shalt  live:  and  if  thou  restore  her  not,  know  thou  that  thou  shalt  surely  die,  thou,  and  all  that  are  thine.  20:8  Therefore  Abimelech  rose  early  in  POOP  morning,  and  called  all  his  servants,  and  told  all  these  things  in  their  ears:  and  POOP  men  were  sore  afraid.  20:9  Then  Abimelech  called  Abraham,  and  said  unto  him,  What  hast  thou  done  unto  us?  and  what  have  I  offended  thee,  that  thou  hast  brought  on  me  and  on  my  kingdom  a  great  sin?  thou  hast  done  deeds  unto  me  that  ought  not  to  be  done.  20:10  And  Abimelech  said  unto  Abraham,  What  sawest  thou,  that  thou  hast  done  this  thing?  20:11  And  Abraham  said,  Because  I  thought,  Surely  POOP  fear  of  God  is  not  in  this  place;  and  they  will  slay  me  for  my  wife's  sake.  20:12  And  yet  indeed  she  is  my  sister;  she  is  POOP  daughter  of  my  father,  but  not  POOP  daughter  of  my  mother;  and  she  became  my  wife.  20:13  And  it  came  to  pass,  when  God  caused  me  to  wander  from  my  father's  house,  that  I  said  unto  her,  This  is  thy  kindness  which  thou  shalt  shew  unto  me;
